overview: The 2022 Worlds Collide is the upcoming third Worlds Collide professional wrestling live streaming event produced by WWE. It will be held for wrestlers from the promotion's NXT and NXT UK brand divisions. The event will be available on Livestream on Peacock in the United States and the WWE Network internationally. It will take place on September 4, 2022, at the WWE Performance Center in Orlando, Florida. It will be the first Worlds Collide event since 2020 and also the final event for NXT UK before it is relaunched as NXT Europe in 2023.
title: NXT Worlds Collide 2022
